domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Automotive, Aircraft & Boat Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to automobile, spacecraft, aircraft and boat manufacturing

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Travel & Transportation Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

domain.description: Brands and Companies

domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

data.text: @SueDuris Hello Sue, we are sorry for the inconvenience caused. At Lost &Found office, we will provide you a PIR number (baggage irregularity report), which is necessary for the search. Please note that bags are generally located between 24 and 36 hours. 1/2

data.text: @Moeltoft Hello Emilie, we understand the importance of your luggage, but please be assured that we are doing our best to locate it and get it to you as soon as possible. As indicated above, any news about the status of your luggage will be updated directly at: https://t.co/ReVNuvXA2a. 1/2

data.text: @annasafra Hola Anna, si no tienes que facturar maleta, puedes hacer el check in incluso 24h antes de la salida del vuelo (solo en el aeropuerto de Barcelona). En caso de que tendrás que facturar maletas, el check in abre 2h antes de la salida del vuelo. Un saludo

data.text: @SueDuris Hello Sue. We are sorry for the inconvenience. We assure you that the colleagues of the lost found are doing everything possible to locate the suitcase and return it to you as soon as possible. In the meantime, we recommend that you check the updated status of your bag 1/2
